active_incidents.title: Trouble with uploading and downloading files in Slack

notes.body: We're still looking into the issue and investigating the root cause, but we don't have any additional information just yet. We'll continue to keep you updated here.

Some customers may be experiencing trouble uploading and downloading files in Slack. We apologize for the disruption.

We're actively looking into this, and we'll report back as more information becomes available.
